mapper.update: update position set position_name = #{position_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_parent_id = #{position_parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position_desc = #{position_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visible_position_ids = #{visible_position_ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daogou = #{daogou,jdbcType=INTEGER} where position_id = #{position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select position_id, position_name, position_parent_id, position_desc, visible_position_ids, daogou from position where position_id = #{position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select position_id, position_name, position_parent_id, position_desc, visible_position_ids, daogou from position
